meanings.definition: A substance applied to the body to prevent body odor.
meanings.sent1: I put on deodorant after my shower to stay fresh.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new deodorant with a pleasant scent.
meanings.sent3: The deodorant danced in the bathroom, keeping bad smells away.
meanings.sent4: His charm was like deodorant, masking any hint of unpleasantness.
meanings.sent5: The deodorant worked like a shield against body odor, protecting me all day.

meanings.definition: A product used to mask or eliminate unpleasant odors.
meanings.sent1: The deodorant spray quickly removed the bad smell.
meanings.sent2: We used a strong deodorant to cover up the odor.
meanings.sent3: The deodorant and the air freshener had a battle of scents.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a deodorant, making the room feel brighter.
meanings.sent5: The deodorant worked like magic, making the room smell like flowers.
